A graphical study into the proportions of the Fire TV screen and the conceptual space within.  An underlying 16 x8 'grid' creates a fixed number of 144 geometric shapes, which are digitally manipulated into a sequence of linked compositions. The resulting images are distinct, but not predetermined. Spatial qualities of expansion, layering, scale and symmetry emerge through shifts in colour and form.

assets.accessibilityLabel: Clouds Over The Golden Gate Bridge

pointsOfInterest.0: The Golden Gate Bridge can be seen peeking above the clouds as they slowly roll by.
A quiet, sunny afternoon view of The Bay Bridge crossing over Treasure Island.

One of the many incredible species of marine life that call Hawaii home, these spinner dolphins are curious, playful and inspiring to watch.  They visit the Hawaiian shoreline during the day to rest and socialize, before returning to the deep blue at dusk to find their nightly catch.

The Faroe Islands are made up of 18 rocky, volcanic islands between Iceland and Norway in the North Atlantic Ocean. Their rugged terrain and unique landscapes make them a sight to behold from the ground and above.
Star trails illuminate the night sky as waves crash along the rocky coastline.
City lights are seen here from outer space as planet Earth slowly rotates on its axis. The dark vastness of space can be seen behind the curvature of Earth.
The sun sets behind a mountain as the stars appear and travel across the night sky.
A time-lapse of the Milky Way Galaxy traveling across the night sky.
Clouds roll over mountaintops and give way to a time-lapse of the Milky Way Galaxy glowing across the night sky.
